description:
Kyoichiro receives a textbook purchasing guide from Imperial University. Kyoichiro is ready to start his schooling, but he can`t help but remember Misaki, Shigure, Tatebayashi, and the others he met the day before, as well as the dead soul he saw. Realizing there`s not much he can do about it, he decides to go out shopping, only to run into Senge in the street.
Source: crunchyroll
